raw akas.title: Life Below Zero: Überleben in Alaska

akas: Life Below Zero: Überleben in Alaska Germany
akas from release info: Life Below Zero: Überleben in Alaska Germany

1.title: Changing of the Guard
1.plot: Andy prepares for winter on the Yukon. Jessie trains for the Iditarod. Glenn prepares camp for his family's arrival. The Hailstones hunt moose and gather wood. Sue checks for predators.

2.title: End of the Rope
2.plot: Sue prepares Kavik for a brutal winter storm. Andy constructs a new storage building. Glenn hunts a caribou to share with his family. The Hailstones go ice fishing.

3.title: No Guarantees
3.plot: Sue sets up game cams at Kavik. Andy hunts for caribou. Jessie struggles to harvest water. Chip and Agnes set traps.

4.title: Arctic Harvest
4.plot: Sue harvests water and makes a water heater. Andy processes caribou. Jessie collects wood. Chip and Carol hunt caribou.

5.title: Home Again
5.plot: Sue experiments with a primitive hunting method for ptarmigan. Andy adjusts the new puppies to his sled team. Ricko discovers bear sign in his cabin. The Hailstones take baby Wade to snare rabbits.

6.title: The Great Unknown
6.plot: Sue assesses the conditions of her new property at Chena River. Ricko traps for beaver. Jessie trains new puppies for the dog team. Agnes, Edward, and Idi embark on a wood gathering trip.

7.title: A Lesson Learned
7.plot: Sue gathers resources at her property in Chena. Ricko must repair a vital communications tool in Huslia. Jessie goes on a rabbit hunting trip. Chip and Carol hunt ptarmigan.

8.title: Into the Storm
8.plot: Sue must build new furniture from scratch. Ricko traps a dangerous foe. Jessie constructs a new workshop. The Hailstones journey through a treacherous storm.

9.title: Trail of Wolves
9.plot: Sue makes a dangerous river crossing for ptarmigan. Ricko repairs damages from a bear. Jessie prepares for the Iditarod and makes a startling discovery. Chip scopes out predator tracks and hunts caribou at Kiwalik.

10.title: Trial by Fire
10.plot: Jessie runs the race of a lifetime at the Iditarod. Ricko hunts for small game. The Hailstones go on a family rabbit hunt. Sue clears snow from her rooftops.

11.title: Window of Opportunity
11.plot: Sue settles back into life at Kavik. Ricko replaces the cabin stove. Jessie struggles to free his four-wheeler from the frozen mud. Chip and Agnes hunt an apex predator.

12.title: Winds of Change
12.plot: Glenn pursues caribou as his stores run dry. Ricko teaches his daughter to hunt geese. The Hailstones prepare for an intensifying winter. Sue must withstand a blizzard at Kavik.

13.title: The Burning Man
13.plot: Agnes and Doug go on a traditional seal hunt. Glenn must dispose of a trespass cabin. Jessie hunts along the river for food and medicine. Sue brushes up on her survival skills.

14.title: Open Season
14.plot: The Hailstones bind together for a family hunt. Jessie recuperates from a hard-fought Iditarod. Ricko finds an unexpected treasure. Sue's rush to clear the runway is interrupted by an unexpected breakdown.

15.title: The Great Changeover
15.plot: The Hailstones build a new temporary structure in the Kiwalik region. Ricko teaches his younger children survival skills. Sue races against the clock to renovate a key camp fixture. Jessie battles weather and chance to secure a meal.

16.title: The Nightmare
16.plot: The Hailstones continue to improvise structures to increase their odds of surviving the Kiwalik. Jessie gathers resources from the Nenana river. Sue ventures out to secure Kavik's perimeter. Finding havoc at his cabin in the woods, Ricko must reckon with a malevolent force stalking his family grounds.

17.title: Treading Water
17.plot: Jessie collects logs in anticipation of the coming winter. The Hailstones prepare themselves for the coming fish run. Ricko teaches his younger children to hunt and fish. Sue tests her mettle against the capricious, flooding tundra.

18.title: Highways of the Arctic
18.plot: The Hailstones are forced to spend an unexpected night on the water. Sue battles strong river currents to source coal. Ricko net fishes with a family net. Jessie uses every means necessary to gather firewood.

19.title: Back in the Saddle
19.plot: Andy returns home to pick up the pieces. Jessie must harvest salmon before the close of the fishing season. Sue searches the local waterways for winter food. The Hailstones gather key resources.

20.title: Race Against Time
20.plot: To survive in the Arctic, Alaskans must battle Father Time to harvest the last of summer's bounty. Sue tracks a lone predator. The Hailstones have a chance at a key resource. Jessie builds a new cabin, and Andy fights the clock.

21.title: No One Fights Alone
21.plot: Andy Bassich must secure clean water to grow vital crops. Sue Aikens stalks a herd of caribou to secure meat for the winter. The Hailstones gather and hunt in Kiwalik. Jessie Holmes returns to a familiar area to hunt a dangerous predator.

22.title: Cost of Winter
22.plot: Ricko DeWilde heads out on a proxy moose hunt. Sue Aikens builds an arctic entryway. The Hailstones pass down family fishing techniques. Andy Bassich revives his land after his injury. Jessie Holmes works on cabin before conditions worsen.

1.title: End of the Road
1.plot: Six people struggle to survive in the Alaskan bush. Chip works to set out nets over thin ice. Andy tests out the Yukon River.

2.title: Hunt, Barter and Steal
2.plot: Sue returns to stolen fuel in Kavik after being away recovering from an injury. The late freeze up of the river causes problems for Chip and Agnes.

3.title: Winters Edge
3.plot: Winter is coming and the cast struggles to prepare for the cold ahead. Sue sets up her camp for an upcoming blizzard . She also prepares firearms in case of a wildlife attack. Erik works to collect water and wood.

4.title: Wolf at the Door
4.plot: A wolf gives Sue problems in Kavik. Chip's snow machine breaks down, hurting his preparation for winter. Erik plays a game of cat and mouse with a lynx.

5.title: Blood, Sweat and Fear
5.plot: Sue has trouble trying to get a plane in to deliver more fuel. A wolf continues to outsmart Erik as it steals all of the bait from his traps.

6.title: There Be Monsters
6.plot: Kate helps Andy collect wood for their camp. Andy has a surprise for Kate's birthday. Chip and Agnes go on a hunt that could mean getting enough meat for the rest of the year.

7.title: Cold Dark and ALone
7.plot: Six individuals struggle to survive in a harsh winter. Sue works to get some ptarmigan for her plate. Erik crashes his snow machine while checking traps, forcing him to make an unscheduled trip to Fairbanks.

8.title: Checkmate
8.plot: Sue must decide what to do when a predator gets dangerously close. Andy embarks on a trip to bring home his new sawmill, but not everything goes according to plan.

9.title: The Chase
9.plot: Chip and Agnes are on the hunt for a wolf. Sue hunts a moose, which could provide enough meat for the whole year. Kate and Andy must prepare for the thaw in order to keep their camp protected.

10.title: Hell and High Water
10.plot: Sue goes to Fairbanks to officially buy Kavik River camp. Andy and Kate must move their dogs so that they may survive the flood. Erik rents out his hunting lodge in preparation for bear season.

1.title: Hunt or Be Hunted
1.plot: Winter has ended, presenting new challenges and dangers in light of the thaw. Andy and Kate must defend themselves against animals coming out of hibernation." Chip and Agnes hunt beavers and river rats.

2.title: The Meltdown
2.plot: The melting snow is causing problems for Sue, who needs to keep her runway clear for incoming visitors and supplies. The Hailstones head off on a huge fishing trip, which could ensure food for months.

3.title: The Mess of Success
3.plot: With a missing water filter and a late load of food, Sue is in danger of losing business this summer. Andy and Kate build a greenhouse in hopes of providing more food for the whole year.

4.title: Hungry Country
4.plot: Glenn must fish to rebuild his food supply, but it's the mosquitoes, not the fish, that are biting. Sue is spots a strange figure in the distance and investigates it. Finding nothing, she searches for black gold instead.

5.title: No Time to Lose
5.plot: Sue works to fill her freezer as summer comes to a close. She heads out on a caribou hunt. To save energy Andy fishes with a net instead of the fish wheel, but this method introduces new challenges and dangers.

6.title: Long Road Home
6.plot: Glenn runs out of food and must begin the long journey back to Fairbanks. The Hailstones head out to Agnes' family camp to get salmon to put up for the summer. Sue must deal with running out of fuel.

1.title: Winter's Warning
1.plot: Sue goes on a hunt for a grizzly bear. Andy and Kate have just fed the last of their fish to their sled dogs. Chip and Agnes' fishing is being disrupted by a late freeze. Erik returns this season after completing the latest guiding season.

2.title: Deadly Grounds
2.plot: Erik Salitan hunts on Kodiak Island he has the opportunity to go after the elusive mountain goat, one of the most difficult hunts in Alaska.

3.title: Dark Times Ahead
3.plot: Chip and Agnes head out on a moose hunt. Sue works to make sure her camp and business get closed. Early snowfall has left Andy and Kate concerned that winter is quickly approaching. Erik uses new traps to catch a prized fox.

4.title: Calling the Wild
4.plot: Because the river isn't freezing up, Andy must cut a trail through the forest. A storm threatens Sue's efforts to get oil. Erik continues collecting furs, which are vital to his income. Chip and Agnes are behind on getting meat for winter.

5.title: Fire and Ice
5.plot: Cody Allen joins Andy and Kate to learn what it takes to survive in the bush. Sue prepares for bears coming too close to camp. Erik makes room for the meat he will be bringing in. Agnes and her children head out of town for a seal hunt.

6.title: Thin Ice
6.plot: With low levels of snow, Andy and Kate struggle to train their dogs. The warm weather has Sue worrying about fuel and predators and it puts a halt to the Hailstone's ice fishing efforts.

7.title: Return to the Wild
7.plot: Glenn returns to his camp after spending months away. Andy and Kate's apprentice, Cody, wakes up late at night to find his fire has gone out. Sue falls down, further aggravating past injuries.

8.title: No Mercy
8.plot: Sue closes camp and heads to Deadhorse to pick up new equipment. Cody learns from Andy and Kate about life in the bush. Chip chops firewood to save on oil prices. Glenn focuses on getting water not just for drinking, but for bathing.

9.title: Breaking Point
9.plot: Sue travels back to camp in her new piece of equipment. Cody proves himself by going out in the bush all alone overnight . Chip and Agnes teach their daughter, Carol, how to set a fur trap. Glenn works on preparing his fire for the winter.

10.title: Search and Rescue
10.plot: The Hailstone family is concerned when Agnes' son Jon doesn't show up on time. The weather makes Sue's work difficult to complete. Andy and Kate start training new lead dogs. Glenn builds a shelter to protect from bears.

11.title: The Howling
11.plot: A snowstorm is headed toward Sue's camp. Andy works quickly to collect supplies before the breakup. Chip and Agnes prepare for a hunting trip. Glenn tracks a wolf that has been howling at night.

12.title: Dark Winter's End
12.plot: Chip and Agnes have one more shot to get a caribou before summer. Sue worries about predators while out on the tundra. Glenn finds wolf tracks while on a hunt. Andy collects as the weather starts to warm up.

13.title: Independent by Nature
13.plot: The cast learns that self reliance is the key to an independent life in the bush on this compilation of episodes from past seasons.

1.title: The Waiting Game
1.plot: The conditions warm up in Alaska, but that does not mean that life in the bush of Alaska is any easier.

2.title: Opportunity Knocks
2.plot: Alaskans learn the tough lesson that you have to act fast when opportunity presents itself.

3.title: The Harvest
3.plot: As the days until summer become fewer, unpredictable weather makes life difficult for Alaskans.

4.title: Sink or Swim
4.plot: Alaskans must stock up on food before the harsh winter hits.

5.title: Ticking Clock
5.plot: With winter rapidly approaching, Alaskans must work to stock pile for the brutal months ahead.

6.title: Last Minute Push
6.plot: Alaskans are in a time crunch as the thaw comes to end, giving way to winter.

7.title: End of Days
7.plot: Summer is quickly coming to an end, and Alaskans must prepare for a long, dark winter.

1.title: Ready or Not
1.plot: Fall season in the Arctic means final preparation is in full swing for the long winter months ahead. In Eagle, Andy and Kate race to get their fish wheel turning before the chum salmon run hits.

2.title: Armed for Winter
2.plot: With winter around the corner, Alaskans prepare themselves for the onslaught. In Chandalar, Glenn must haul a felled moose over land and water to get it back to the safety of his camp.

3.title: Out of Control
3.plot: Alaskans are preparing for the winter months. In Eagle, Andy hunts for elusive moose, as he and Kate need to replenish their red meat supply for the coming winter. In Kavik, Sue seals up camp and heads to Fairbanks for a foot procedure.

4.title: The Unknown
4.plot: In Fairbanks, Sue travels 150 miles on an icy road to investigate a tip that squatters are on her property in central Alaska, and in Chandalar, Glenn chases after a pack of wolves in hopes of harvesting leftover caribou meat.

5.title: Ice Highway
5.plot: In Noorvik, Chip builds a freight sled for winter travel. A blizzard strands Sue in Fairbanks and she must brave a notoriously dangerous road to get home to Kavik.

6.title: Darkness Falls
6.plot: With a hundred days of no sunlight ahead, Glenn must secure more wood for heat. Andy and Kate rescue a lone bear cub that has wandered into their camp. The Hailstones gather a vital resource for themselves as well as their neighbors.

7.title: Alone in the Dark
7.plot: With dark winter in full swing, Alaskans face new challenges in sub-zero temperatures. Andy maintains the snow-covered trails and takes care of the dogs on his own. Erik takes his wife hunting for animal hides to supplement their income.

8.title: Emergency Cache
8.plot: In Noorvik, the Hailstones stash emergency supplies along their hunting and trapping routes. In Kavik, Sue's contact with the outside world hangs in the balance. In Wiseman, Erik takes a fall while gathering firewood.

9.title: No Easy Out
9.plot: In harsh winter conditions, Alaskans must work hard to finish even the easiest of tasks.

10.title: Bent and Broken
10.plot: As winter comes to an end, Alaskans struggle to overcome new obstacles. Sue clears her runway. Andy stalks a lethal predator. The Hailstone's hunt takes a turn for the worse.

11.title: The Crash
11.plot: A crafty predator rattles the Hailstone's strategy. Glenn races against the wild to protect his food stock. The Salitans hunt for big game in winter's twilight. Sue's escape from Kavik leads to a grave mistake.

12.title: Aftermath
12.plot: Sue deals with the aftermath of her accident. Chip and Agnes wrap up their hunting season. Glenn builds a meat drying rack. Erik and Martha go on a fishing trip.

1.title: The Resurrection
1.plot: Sue returns to Kavik after her injury. Glenn goes on a hunt. Jessie preps his fish wheel for summer. The Hailstones set up camp in a new location.

2.title: The Bottom Line
2.plot: Sue runs into problems when preparing for new clients. Glenn travels to an abandoned cabin. Jessie sets up his summer fishing camp. The Hailstones start collecting their favorite summer foods.

3.title: Running on Empty
3.plot: Sue's nephew visits Kavik. Glenn scouts for sheep. Jessie puts his fish wheel in the water. The Hailstones go on a seal hunt.

4.title: Red Flag
4.plot: Sue works to get her food supply ready in preparation for incoming clients. Glenn fishes for pike. Jessie has motor issues while fishing for salmon. When bad weather hits, the Hailstones must secure their camp.

5.title: Predator Control
5.plot: Sue sets out on a caribou hunt. Erik tries his hand at bow hunting. Jessie repairs his fish wheel. The Hailstones travel to Deering.

6.title: Divide and Conquer
6.plot: In Kavik, Sue heads to a nearby fishing hole to try and replenish her food supply. In Kiwalik, the Hailstones Chip sets out to gather wood for materials to help the family preserve their food, while Agnes and the girls gather berries for the winter ahead. In Nenana, Jessie does squirrel maintenance around camp to protect his dog food supply. In Wiseman, Erik and Martha head down the river in search of Arctic Grayling.

7.title: Under the Gun
7.plot: Sue meets with a gun smith. Martha goes on a duck hunt. Jessie readies his dog yard for winter. The Hailstones collect greens and hunt ducks.

8.title: Lost in the Wild
8.plot: Sue builds a smoker. Erik and Martha go salmon fishing. Jessie travels down river. The Hailstones build a tower.

1.title: On the Edge
1.plot: Sue readies her camp for the coming winter. Glenn makes his move from Fairbanks to Chandalar. Jessie revamps his entire dog lot. The Hailstones begin work on a mobile home.

2.title: Pride and Power
2.plot: Sue waits on a fuel delivery. Glenn goes on a moose hunt. Jessie revamps his dog lot. The Hailstones begin to build a mobile home.

3.title: Falling Apart
3.plot: Sue makes needed repairs around camp. Jessie collects fish from his fish wheel. Glenn works to haul a moose back to camp. Chip processes and trades pieces of a caribou.

4.title: Deadly Tracks
4.plot: Sue returns to Kavik and secures camp. Glenn searches for goose grass and sets traps. Jessie clears a trail for his dog team. Chip and Carol build and set snares.

5.title: Breaking Through
5.plot: Sue hunts for ptarmigan. Glenn shoots and kills a porcupine. Jessie rebuilds an old sled for a dog run. The Hailstones set traps for ice fishing.

6.title: Shakedown
6.plot: Sue prepares for a blizzard and takes snow depth measurements. Glenn explores new hunting grounds. Jessie runs his dog team in a race on the Denali Highway. The Hailstone girls make a new wolf parka.

7.title: Ghosts of Winter
7.plot: Sue faces her fears on the new snow machine. Glenn processes wood and bakes bread. Andy kills a large caribou. Chip and Idi build a basket sled.

8.title: No Boundaries
8.plot: Sue travels to a nearby forest and makes medicine from tree buds. Glenn hunts for caribou. Andy breaks new trail. The Hailstones transport their tent frame to Emonakrov.

9.title: Trapped and Hunted
9.plot: Sue hunts ptarmigan. Glenn processes caribou meat. Andy builds traps and makes beaver mittens. The Hailstones make ice holes and go sheefishing.

10.title: Winter Kill
10.plot: Sue hunts and kills a caribou. Glenn comes head-on with a wolf. Andy wrecks his snow machine. Chip and Agnes head to their remote camp.

11.title: Sue Aikens
11.plot: A look back at the life of Sue Aikens in Life Below Zero.

12.title: Loaded
12.plot: Sue gets stuck with the loader on the road from Deadhorse to Kavik. Glenn suffers a leg injury on a trek home. Andy kills and processes a lynx. Chip hunts for muskox.

13.title: The Hailstones
13.plot: A look back at the lives of the Hailstones in Life Below Zero.

14.title: No Shortcuts
14.plot: Sue's loader travels to Kavik on a convoy. Glenn builds a snow cave and stays on the mountain overnight. Andy rebuilds his wind turbine. Agnes and Chip travel home to Noorvik.

15.title: Glenn Villeneuve
15.plot: Sixty-five miles above the Arctic Circle, in a sparse Brooks Range, Glenn Villeneuve has given up nearly all modern conveniences to carve out a life of freedom in the wild.

1.title: The Confrontation
1.plot: Sue hunts a rogue wolverine that has been stalking Kavik. Glenn embarks on a long journey back to camp on foot. Andy checks his traps and catches a beaver. Chip makes bullets and goes ptarmigan hunting.

2.title: Blindsided
2.plot: Sue gathers peat moss and reopens her greenhouse. Glenn finishes the long journey home. Andy prepares for the Yukon break-up. The Hailstones hunt for geese.

3.title: River of Rage
3.plot: Sue experiences problems with her fuel system in Kavik. Glenn fishes and hunts for ducks. Andy deals with break-up in Eagle. Chip and Agnes hunt for caribou at camp.

4.title: Head Above Water
4.plot: Sue fixes the loader and clears the runway at Kavik. Glenn crosses a freezing river to retrieve an old canoe. Andy builds and tests a kayak. The Hailstones move their camp and make a drying rack.

5.title: Against the Tide
5.plot: Sue unloads and sets up new heating system at Kavik. Glenn scouts for shelter and hunts from his canoe. Andy catches and smokes fish in the rain. The Hailstones fish for herring at camp.

6.title: The Slow Grind
6.plot: Sue crosses the river and goes fishing. Glenn travels up a mountain, scouts sheep, and rebuilds a blind. Andy builds a yurt with a young client. The Hailstones gather and cook eggs.

7.title: Midnight Sun
7.plot: Sue sets up a new fuel system at Kavik. Glenn creates a safety system for his canoe. Andy heads to American Summit in search of bears and blueberries. Chip and Doug go on a caribou hunt.

8.title: Higher Ground
8.plot: Sue goes on a caribou hunt in the Argo. Glenn climbs the highest mountain at Chandalar. Andy tends to his garden. The Hailstones harvest seals.

1.title: Unfamiliar Territory
1.plot: Sue leaves Kavik for the Arctic National Wildlife Refuge. Glenn gets creative to fall a tree near his cabin. Jessie races to get a fish wheel running before the season ends. Agnes and the girls go caribou hunting.

2.title: Howl of the Wild
2.plot: Sue experiences wolves at the Arctic National Wildlife Refuge. Glenn hunts for bull moose. Jessie sets up a new sawmill. Agnes and the girls go net fishing at Kookoochiaq.

3.title: The 11th Hour
3.plot: Sue scouts for sheep at the Arctic National Wildlife Refuge. Glenn sets beaver snares. Jessie runs the Cantwell Sled Dog Race. Andy goes muskrat trapping.

4.title: Burn the Midnight Oil
4.plot: Sue secures the runway at Kavik. Glenn embarks on a caribou hunt in the mountains. Jessie breaks new trail with his dogs and searches for ptarmigan. Andy builds and tests a new ice boat on the lake.

5.title: Arctic Super Moon
5.plot: Sue forages for water sources around Kavik. Glenn chisels ice for his cold storage and observes an Arctic super moon. Jessie builds a new sled. Andy camps out and goes trapping for marten.

6.title: Winter's Grip
6.plot: Sue repurposes materials to build a sauna. Glenn secures his meat cache from wolverine. Jessie travels to Minto to retrieve an injured dog. Andy tests the safety of the Yukon's ice and sets a trail.

7.title: Shelter from the Storm
7.plot: Agnes and Qutan cut wood and prepare to meet a new member of the family. Glenn builds an igloo on a mountain. Jessie sets burbot lines in the ice. Andy sets up a new battery system at Calico Bluff.

8.title: False Start
8.plot: Agnes and Ting retrieve a sled and tipi from Kiwalik. Glenn goes paragliding off of a mountain. Jessie deals with snow removal around camp. Andy transitions his pups to the full dog team.

1.title: Homecoming
1.plot: Andy prepares for the Yukon River break-up. Jessie hunts muskrats in the river. Glenn goes duck hunting. The Hailstone ladies hunt for birds in preparation for Chip's return home.

2.title: New Territory
2.plot: Andy goes duck hunting on the lake. Jessie builds a new dog yard for his team. Glenn journeys to Thru-Creek Pass. The Hailstones hunt muskrats for fur.

3.title: Facing Fears
3.plot: Andy modifies and strengthens his greenhouse. Jessie builds a new smokehouse. Glenn camps out, goes fishing, and spots a dangerous animal. Chip goes hunting for ducks.

4.title: To Catch a King
4.plot: Andy net fishes for king salmon. Jessie builds a raft for firewood. Glenn explores a primitive camp. The Hailstones go pole fishing at camp.

5.title: The Intruder
5.plot: Andy builds an elevator for his yurt. Jessie camps out and goes hunting on Bear Hill. Glenn returns home from Thru-Creek Pass. The Hailstones hunt and pick berries.

6.title: Heavy Load
6.plot: Andy refines his gardening and compost system. Jessie net fishes for king salmon. Glenn creates and runs in a triathlon at Chandalar. Sue receives a tent shipment and begins the build.

7.title: The Widowmaker
7.plot: Andy undergoes reconstruction of his fish wheel. Jessie gathers chaga and burl posts. Glenn encounters a dangerous animal and hunts for Dall sheep. Sue constructs a pop-up tent and camps out, gathering resources.

8.title: Close Encounter
8.plot: Andy explores new territory for a moose and bear hunt. Jessie heads downriver for a fishing campout. The Hailstones set nets for salmon fishing. Glenn hunts and processes a bull moose. Sue builds a blind on the tundra for caribou hunting.

-1.title: Predator vs. Prey
-1.plot: Living in remote wilderness inhabited by dangerous and deadly predators, Alaskans must remain on high alert.

locations: Arctic National Wildlife Refuge, Alaska, USA
imdb.title: Life Below Zero
plot: The everyday struggles of living in the secluded state of Alaska where one wrong decision could cost you your life.
